meanings: (재산·세력 등을 커지게 하다) increase, (세력 등을) extend

vlive.korean: 이거 아까 불려놓은 거 있죠? Remember the rice cakes we soaked in water earlier? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 떡국 만들기🐥🍲

examples.korean: It has been called modern-day slavery. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 현대판 노예제도라고 불려 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It has been called modern-day slavery. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Lentils do not require soaking before cooking. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 렌즈콩은 요리하기 전에 물에 불릴 필요가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Lentils do not require soaking before cooking. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Mathematics was once dubbed the handmaiden of the sciences. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 수학이 한때는 과학의 시녀로 불렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Mathematics was once dubbed the handmaiden of the sciences. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The painting is called ‘Adoration of the Infant Christ’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 그림은 ‘아기 예수님에 대한 경배’로 불린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The painting is called ‘Adoration of the Infant Christ’. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ancestor of the modern bicycle was called a penny-farthing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 현대판 자전거의 전신은 페니파딩이라 불렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ancestor of the modern bicycle was called a penny-farthing. Add to Wordbook
